general.name: Shyamsundar Prabhakar Indra
general.title: AI Engineer Intern
general.summary: An aspiring Computer Vision engineer with solid Mathematical and Programming fundamentals, and a strong inclination towards research based work.

experience.name: Centre for Robotics & Intelligent Systems - BITS Pilani
highlights: Successfully defended thesis on Deep Learning applications in Computer Vision for level-3 autonomous vehicles
Implemented and trained a Bi-Directional LSTM Network on temporal tracking data to predict the path of pedestrians 2 seconds into the future.

experience.name: IIIT Bangalore
highlights: Utilized a YOLO based object detection model for plant leaf counting in order to monitor crop health for a farm robot.
Involved in 3D modelling of parts for the farm robot.
Mentored five new interns to model an autonomous robotic assembly line.

experience.name: Robert Bosch Centre for Cyber Physical Systems - IISc Bangalore
highlights: Implemented a LIDAR based 3D object detection model for a level-3 Autonomous Vehicle sponsored by WIPRO.
Developed a low-level control package communicating with the perception stack using Control Barrier Functions (CBFs) for obstacle avoidance.
Verified the controller in Carla - an autonomous driving simulator.

experience.name: UMD Vision & Learning Lab
highlights: Working on CLIP based generation of animations along with their 3D mesh using GAN Inversion and 3D-GAN.

experience.name: Renesas North America Ltd.
highlights: Developed a SVM based lightweight ML anti-spoofing model, that can reject spoof inputs in voice authentication systems.
Working on embedded deployment of the model on a Renesas Edge device.
Contributing to the companyâ€™s automated AI deployment software.

courses: Teaching Assistant ENME272 - Computer Aided Design, Spring 2023
President - Pilani Tamil Mandram, Tamil cultural organization

achievements.title: All India Rank 1073 in JEE Mains out of 1.2 million candidates
Top 0.04 percentile in JEE Advanced, entrance exams to prestigious IITs
